name: WhatFont
desc: The easiest way to identify fonts on web pages.

name: WhatRuns
desc: Discover what runs a website. Frameworks, Analytics Tools, Wordpress Plugins, Fonts - you name it.

name: Web Developer
desc: Adds a toolbar button with various web developer tools.

name: Awesome Screenshot & Screen Recorder
desc: Full page screen capture and screen recorder - 2 in 1. Share screencast video instantly

name: daily.dev - News for Busy Developers
desc: Get programming news with zero effort. Simply open a new tab, and you’re all set. A must-have tool for busy developers!

name: JSONView
desc: Validate and view JSON documents.

name: JSON Lite
desc: Browser extension for viewing JSON files.

name: Window Resizer
desc: Resize the browser window to emulate various screen resolutions.

name: Responsive Viewer
desc: Show multiple screens once, Responsive design tester

name: BrowserStack
desc: Instantly test your webpage on any desktop or mobile browser.

name: VisBug
desc: Open source web design debug tool built with JavaScript

name: Keyframes
desc: In-browser CSS Animation creator.

name: Kontrast - WCAG Contrast Checker
desc: Quickly check and adjust contrast in real-time in your browser to meet WCAG 2.1 requirements

name: PerfectPixel
desc: Adds a semi-transparent image overlay over the top of the developed HTML to easily perform pixel perfect comparison between them, useful for replicating UI designs.

name: Pesticide
desc: Inserts the Pesticide CSS into the current page, outlining each HTML element to better see placement on the page, helpful for building layouts.

name: Site Palette
desc: A must-have tool for designers and frontend developers to grab colors for any website.

name: Mobile/Responsive Web Design Tester
desc: Test responsive web designs or mobile pages that detect specific user agents. Test multiple devices at the same time!

name: ColorZilla
desc: Advanced Eyedropper, Color Picker, Gradient Generator and other colorful goodies

name: Lorem Ipsum Generator (Default Text)
desc: Provides an elegant and quick way to create default text or generate Lorem Ipsum. Optimized for quick usage, but it can be customized.

name: JavaScript and CSS Code Beautifier
desc: Beautify CSS, JavaScript and JSON code when you open a .css/.js/.json file

name: Imageye - Image downloader
desc: Find and download all images on a web page. With Imageye you can find, browse and download all the images present in a web page.

name: GoFullPage - Full Page Screen Capture
desc: Capture a screenshot of your current page in entirety and reliably—without requesting any extra permissions!

name: Stylebot
desc: Change the appearance of the web instantly.

name: ColorPick Eyedropper
desc: A zoomed eyedropper & color chooser tool that allows you to select color values from webpages and more.

name: React Developer Tool
desc: React debugging tools to the Chrome Developer Tools. It allows you to inspect the React component hierarchies in the Chrome Developer Tools.

name: Wappalyzer
desc: Wappalyzer is a technology profiler that shows you what websites are built with.

name: Fake Filler
desc: Fake Filler a form filler that fills all inputs on a page with fake/dummy data.

name: Page Ruler Redux
desc: A Web Developer\Designer ruler to get perfect pixel dimensions and positioning to measure elements on any web page.

name: Web Editor
desc: The web editor is the tool that provides you with an enhanced way to inspect any website elements, alter their properties, insert contents, design, and visualize the way you want to see them.

name: CSSViewer
desc: A simple CSS property viewer.

name: Fonts Ninja
desc: Identify fonts from any website, bookmark, try, and buy them.

name: Lighthouse
desc: An open-source, automated tool for improving the performance, quality, and correctness of your web apps.
